header.dec: Where content creators can monetize their content
header.simple_rewards: Simply holding $STAR token in your wallet entitles you to receive USDt rewards

Landing.description: Mint - star - gram is a new social media platform where content creators, influencers, and professional athletes can monetize their content. Every post is a unique token on the blockchain and can be purchased by fans and followers or traders as a collectible or trading object. Fans who purchase a post from their favorite stars gain access to a private chat area.
Landing.question: Why should someone buy my Posts?
Landing.collector_dec: is a huge fan and supporter of you and wants access to the private chat room to get more exclusive content about his idol. They are buying Keys as collectibles.
Landing.trade_dec: someone who speculates that you will grow your reach and that more people will want to buy or trade your Keys. For example, if you have a following of 10,000 and the trader believes that you can expand your reach to 100,000 followers or more, the demand for the posts will increase. As the posts become more sought after as collectibles, the price that people are willing to pay will likely increase.

collections.first-Collection: Click the button below to create your very first Collection and showcase your collectible content to the world.
collections.see-Collections: Connect your Wallet to see your Collections
collections.collection-name-tooltip: By default, your collection name is your username. Once your collection is created, it cannot be changed.
collections.symbol-tooltip: The collection symbol defaults to the first three letters of your username. Once set, it cannot be altered.
collections.total-tooltip: The total supply is set to 0 by default (0 = unlimited). You can modify this at any time if you decide to limit your collection.
collections.royalties-tooltip: Royalties are set at 5% by default. You can adjust this at any time within the range of 0% to 10%. Your lifetime revenues will be automatically sent to your ''creator'' wallet.
collections.congrats: Congrats! One click away to create your KEY collection, giving fans / key holders exclusive collectibles and "Holders Chat" access. Earn royalties forever, even on sales from platforms like OpenSea.
collections.name: Name

ContentCreator.SelectedCreator: Become a Selected Content Creator and get $500 welcome Bonus
ContentCreator.MintStargramAccount: Your MintStargram.tech account must be at least 7 days old.
ContentCreator.Possess: Possess a minimum of 10,000 followers on one of the following platforms: Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, or platform X.
ContentCreator.uniqueNFTs: Create at least 7 unique NFTs using the Mint-Post feature within your first month.
ContentCreator.AchieveMinimum: Achieve a minimum of 100 followers within your first 30 days.
ContentCreator.BeaWare: **Please be aware that these criteria may become more stringent based on demand. Keep in mind that even if you meet all requirements, there 's no guarantee of approval. Once you 've earned your badge, strive to retain it.
